text: Anyone know how to get p-values out of forecast objects in R?
In SAS, when you run an AR1,  MA24,  you get significance values for those estimates... but can't figure out where those values are in R.
can someone explain what these lines of code are accomplishing?

# Forecasting with Seasonal Dummy Variables #
For.Month <- rep(0, 24)
For.Month[1:2] <- For.Month[1:2] + 11:12
For.Month[3:24] <- For.Month[3:24] + 1:12
For.M <- factor(For.Month)
For.M <- relevel(For.M, ref = "12")
